sorcer.tools.shell

Class NetworkShell

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.tools.shell.NetworkShell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, DiscoveryListener, INetworkShell

    public class NetworkShell
extends Object
implements DiscoveryListener, INetworkShell
    Author:
    Mike Sobolewski call the 'nsh help' command

      • initShell

        public static String[] initShell(String[] args)
                          throws Throwable
        Initialize the nsh, parsing arguments, loading configuration.
        Parameters:
        args - Command line arguments to parse, must not be null
        Returns:
        Array of string args to be parsed
        Throws:
        Throwable - if anything at all happens that is not supposed to happen

      • huntForTheScriptFile

        public static File huntForTheScriptFile(String input,
                                        String[] standardExtensions)
                                 throws IOException
        Hunt for the script file, doesn't bother if it is named precisely. Tries in this order: - actual supplied name - name.ex - name.exertlet - name.netlet - name.net - name.groovy - name.gvy - name.gy - name.gsh
        Throws:
        IOException

      • readScript
